---
title: "Bills"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
---


```{r}
library(readxl)
library(gt)

# read the first sheet of your Excel file
bills <- read_excel("bill_list.xlsx")

bills$Link <- paste0("[View Bill](Bills/bill_", bills$bill_number, ".pdf)")

# simple nice table with kableExtra
bills %>%
  gt() %>%
  fmt_markdown(columns = "Link") %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "Bills Table",
    subtitle = "Click a link to open the corresponding PDF"
  )
```
